aboutClass.text: Nowadays, most aspects of our lives require apps. From buying goods, ordering food, to making transactions.

Please note that before an application is created, there is a process known as UI / UX Design.Well, this Intro to UI / UX material will help you get to know UI / UX Design fundamentally, as a provision to prepare yourself to become a UI / UX Designer.
To learn this class, you don't need to have any prior UI/UX experience. Therefore, this class is perfect for those of you who:
New to UI/UX Design Switching careers to UI / UX Design Expanding your knowledge of UI / UX Design fundamentally
Skilvul invites you to get to know what UI/UX Design is, the principles of UI / UX Design, and how to create a landing page that you can use as a portfolio in the field of UI / UX Design.

materialToBeLearn.text: Equipped with video tutorials, practice, and quizzes, here are the topics you will learn: UI / UX definitions and tools Using UI / UX Design Frameworks(such as: Design Thinking & Double Diamond), and how to use them Learn to use UI / UX Design tools(such as: Figjam & Figma) Know the preparation stages of creating a landing page Utilize Artificial Intelligent(AI) in creating landing pages Create a landing page in Figma
